definition: abbr. for Beijing/surname Jing/Jing ethnic minority
capital city of a country/big/algebraic term for a large number (old)/artificial mound (old)

pinyin: Bei3 jing1 Shi1 fan4 Da4 xue2

sentences.english: Cheng Zhengmin Professor, School of Literature, Beijing Normal University.
sentences.chinese: 程正民，北京師範大學文學院教授。

sentences.english: I've trained four famous hookers, they are the top ones in the capital.
sentences.chinese: 我訓練出來的四朵金花名震京師，乃雞中之霸。

sentences.english: It is generally believed that teaching of the English language in China began with Tong Wen Guan (The Imperial College of Translators).
sentences.chinese: 人們一般認爲中國學校英語教學肇始於京師同文館。

sentences.english: He's now teaching in Zhu Hai Campus, Beijing Normal University.
sentences.chinese: 現執教於北京師範大學珠海分校。

sentences.english: Have you ever learned any other foreign languages other than English?
sentences.chinese: 上面說你畢業於北京師範大學英語語言文學專業。

sentences.english: As a great university with a history longer than 100 years, BNU has extremely demanding standards.
sentences.chinese: 做爲百年名校，北京師範大學有極爲嚴格的標準。

sentences.english: The development of the university made Luoyang form the strong atmosphere of study of Confucian Classics.
sentences.chinese: 太學的發展，使京師洛陽形成了濃厚的經學文化氛圍。

sentences.english: I am currently studying at Nanjing Normal University .
sentences.chinese: 我現就讀於南京師範大學。

sentences.english: The 20-year-old is a music major at Beijing Normal University.
sentences.chinese: 這位20歲的女孩是來自北京師範大學音樂系的學生。

sentences.english: Professor Li Zhiying from Beijing Normal University has researched trends in the industry.
sentences.chinese: 北京師範大學教授李志英研究了這個行業的趨勢。

sentences.english: It is one of the greatest section of the Great Wall of Ming dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 爲明代京師長城防禦工程的精華地段之一。

sentences.english: Even Peiping , the center of the empire, was not an industrial city.
sentences.chinese: 就是當年的京師北京，也非工業城市。

sentences.english: It takes a lot of hard work and discipline to gain a degree from BNU.
sentences.chinese: 得到北京師範大學的學位需要付出刻苦和自我約束。

sentences.english: I am enrolled in the graduate division of the Department of Education at Beijing Normal University.
sentences.chinese: 我是北京師範大學教育系的在讀研究生。

sentences.english: The steel grid structure is adopted in Beijing Normal University Gymnasium.
sentences.chinese: 北京師範大學體育館屋蓋採用鋼網架結構。

definition: various sages/refers to the classical schools of thought, e.g. Confucianism 儒[ru2] represented by Confucius 孔子[Kong3 zi3] and Mencius 孟子[Meng4 zi3], Daoism 道[dao4] by Laozi 老子[Lao3 zi3] and Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子[Zhuang1 zi3], Mohism 墨[mo4] by Mozi 墨子[Mo4 zi3], Legalism 法[fa3] by Sunzi 孫子|孙子[Sun1 zi3] and Han Feizi 韓非子|韩非子[Han2 Fei1 zi3], and numerous others
Tang and Song dynasty provincial governor, in Tang times having military and civil authority, but only civil authority in Song
Weiyuan county in Neijiang 內江|内江[Nei4 jiang1], Sichuan
Shouyang county in Jinzhong 晉中|晋中[Jin4 zhong1], Shanxi
Su Zhe (1039-1112), Northern Song writer and calligrapher, one of the 三蘇|三苏[San1 Su1] and also one of the 唐宋八大家[Tang2 Song4 ba1 da4 jia1]
Liaodong peninsula between Bohai 渤海 and Yellow sea/east and south of Liaoning province/east of Liao river 遼河|辽河
prisoner of war/to capture/to take prisoner/(old) northern barbarian/slave
Minister of War (official title in pre-Han Chinese states)/two-character surname Sima
Wei State (407-225 BC), one of the Seven Hero States of the Warring States 戰國七雄|战国七雄/Wei State or Cao Wei 曹魏 (220-265), the most powerful of the Three Kingdoms
